short_summary: Assistance required for delivery and supply of an ejector hook.
description: Ejector hook - delivery to CFSD Montreal.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) W8485-237316/D
### Department of National Defence Requests Hook and Ejector Components

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to solicit bids for the procurement of the Hook and Ejector components. The following is a summary of the RFP:

* G-SIN Code: 1095
* Description: Miscellaneous Weapons
* Quantity: 15 units
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Delivery Location: 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) Montreal, FCA Free Carrier

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the Part Number and NCAGE of the proposed product.

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: January 13, 2023, 2:00 PM (ET)
* Amendment Date: January 11, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Transaction Information**

* Solicitation Number: W8485-237316/D
* Reference Number: PW-22-01017803
* Amendment Number: 1
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Contact Information**

* Contact Name: Ryan Duncan
* Contact Email: [ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca)
* Document Reference: W8485-237316_RFP_Eng.pdf and W8485-237316_RFP_Fra.pdf

Download the RFP documentation from the Canada Buys website:
* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/a045175249287ed8a1f8d0d7ceb67fd2/w8485-237316_rfp_eng.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/66318c2fef7d6fc69f658bed72c16581/w8485-237316_rfp_fr.pdf> I rewrote the government tender announcement in a more professional manner. I kept the essential details while improving clarity and grammatical correctness. 

Here is a simple explanation of the changes I made:

* Improved sentence structure and grammar
* Rephrased ambiguous or unclear sentences
